query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `messageTemplateUsage` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `templateId` int NOT NULL,
  `userId` int NOT NULL,
  `channel` enum('email', 'sms') NOT NULL,
  `recipientCount` int NOT NULL,
  `bulkActionId` int,
  `campaignId` int,
  `successCount` int DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  `failureCount` int DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  `createdAt` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (`templateId`) REFERENCES `messageTemplates`(`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  FOREIGN KEY (`userId`) REFERENCES `users`(`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  FOREIGN KEY (`bulkActionId`) REFERENCES `bulkComparisonActions`(`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL,
  INDEX `templateId_idx` (`templateId`),
  INDEX `userId_idx` (`userId`),
  INDEX `channel_idx` (`channel`),
  INDEX `createdAt_idx` (`createdAt`)
)

  INDEX `templateId_idx` (`templateId`),

  INDEX `createdAt_idx` (`createdAt`)
)
